description:
The new Pika is crafted with the same style lines as the original we first sold in 1983. The fabric has the look of old-school nylon packcloth, but it's actually a canvas-textured polyester with a modern water-repellent surface that sheds light rain. This uncomplicated pack will serve you well on daytrips through the woods or around town.

  • Made of canvas-textured recycled polyester with polyurethane coating and DWR treatment
  • Large U-shaped opening accesses the main compartment
  • Curved padded shoulder straps with an adjustable webbing waist belt
  • External pocket with diagonal zipper expands to hold a phone or even your Depeche Mode cassettes
name: MEC Pika 15 Daypack - Unisex
